defs: = ಚಾಮರವಿಕ್ಕು.
(palm.) a particular line in the palm, which is supposed to indicate the person's fortune with regard to wealth, riches.
to move or agitate (the air) with a fan (esp. in a temple or royal court).
a male servant in a royal court, whose work is to fan the king or queen.
= ಚಾಮರಗ್ರಾಹಿಣಿ.
= ಚಾಮರಿಗ.
to settle or arrange rightly.
= ಚಾಮೀಕರ.
gold.
one of the seven mother-goddesses.
Durge, in her formidable form, assumed to kill the demon Caṇḍa.
of, related, got from, a deer or deers.
a king subordinate to another king or emperor.
degree of darkness of a colour; a shade.
the state or quality of shining by reflecting light; lustre.
a manner, way of doing something or in which something is done.
the comparative darkness caused by the interception or screening of rays of light from an object, place or area; shadow.
the plant Oldenlandia umbellata of Rubiaceae family; Indian maddar; chay root plant.
its root, used for medicinal purposes.
a kind of fish .
= ಚಾಯಬೇರು.
= ಚಾಯ.
the act of walking, moving.

a person employed by a government to obtain secret information or intelligence about another or to keeps close and secret watch on the actions and words of a person or a group of persons organisations, etc.; a spy.
a servant; a menial.
a way, manner, in which something is to be done or is done.
a shackle for the hand; handcuff; manacle.
the fact of a person being kept in a prison; imprisonment.
the medium sized tree Buchanania lanzan (= B. latifolia) of Anacardiaceae family, the seeds of which are used as food, esp. in making sweets, and also in getting tannin; forest mango.
a mischievous play.
coarse food for livestock, composed of entire plants, including leaves, stalks, grass etc.; fodder.
the act of proceeding, going (forward), etc.
a servant; a menial.
a place of visit.
a man who depends much on his spies in taking decisions, planning strategies, etc.
a room, shelter, etc. for defecation or urination; a toilet; a privy.
= ಚಾರಚಿಪ್ಪಿ.
= ಚಾರಟೆ.
the plant Hibiscus mutabilis of Malvaceae family.
its flower; changeable rose.
= ಚಾರಟೆ.
the act, process or an instance of wandering.
a particular kind of methodical skill, dexterity or posture in wrestling.
a wandering actor.
a poet and singer of poems; a bard.
a man who praises another highly (either habitually or intentionally).
a celestial singer.
that which causes or urges (something) to move.
(Jain.) a man who knows the art of moving in the air and preaches Jaina religion.
(Jain.) the power or art of moving in the air without any external aid.
a poet who composes and sings poems praising the king or his patron.
the act of driving an elephant by urging it with a sharp-pointed stick.
a verse composition, that can be sung, in praise of another or one's patron.
(Jain.) the mastering of the art of moving in the air by a preacher of Jaina religion.
a particular mode in the game played with a ball.
a movement in wrestling, mace fight, etc, characterised by an advantageous strategy.
an urging of an elephant or horse to move forward.
= ಚಾರಪಾಯಿ.
a cot the sheeting of which is made of interwoven ropes.
amount spent or to be spent for fodder for cattle.
any of the pieces used as pawns in the game of dice or a chessman used in chess.
a kind of dye.
the act or an instance of going, moving, wandering.
transactions of business; dealings; the manner one deals in one's business.
a shackle or manacle that restricts a captured person's movements.
cheapness (of a commodity).
any of several movements on the floor (as with the feet) or in air (as of hands) in dancing.
an advancement strategically made towards one's opponent in a war.
a particular manner or mode of playing a musical instrument.
a sound imitating the cooing of a pigeon.
personal behaviour; way of acting; bearing or deportment; conduct; demeanour.
= ಚಾರಿತ್ರಗೆಡು.
= ಚಾರಿತ್ರ.
to lose character; to behave or conduct oneself in a mean, immoral, unsocial manner.
a man whose behaviour is conforming to moral and ethical principles.
the quality of one's behaviour conforming to moral and ethical principles.
a woman whose behaviour is conforming to moral and ethical principles.

historical - a) of, pertaining to, treating or characteristic of history or past events; b) providing evidence for a fact of history; serving as a source of history; c) fit to be considered as a memorable event in the history.
the condition of having actually occurred in history; authenticity of an event; historicity.
the fact of being historical.
= ಚಾರಿತ್ರ.
the act or an instance of harming or ruining someone's reputation, social status, etc. by slander or vilification; assassination of character.
to move strategically forward.
to cover from all or almost all sides with military force (to conquer another); to seize.
to ask someone earnestly; to entreat humbly; to implore.
to push forward strategically one's army or one's chariot, horse, etc. in a battlefield.
= ಚಾರಿವರಿ1.
= ಚಾರಿವರಿಯಿಸು.
to crush into bits or fine particles between two hard surfaces; to grind.
to mix two or more things by grinding together.
to wield (a sword etc.) with skill and control.
giving delight; very pleasing; delightful: charming.
outstandingly good of its kind; of superior merit, virtue, etc.; excellent.
(mus.) twenty-sixth of the seventy-two main modes of Karnāṭaka music.
a look that conveys compassion or comfort to another.
a good looking body (of a human being).
a man having an attractive, well-proportioned, and imposing appearance suggestive of health and strength.
conformity of one's life and conduct to moral and ethical principles; uprightness; rectitude.
a man having such qualities.
more pleasing, charming or delightful.
excelling another or others in merit, virtue, etc.
the best manner, way or mode.
the quality or condition of being delightful, charming.
a very beautiful woman.
a man the virtue of whose conduct attracts others (or sets an example for others).
an attractive, delighting smile.
a woman whose smile is charming.
the fibrous tissue around the individual segments of a jackfruit.
the medium sized tree Buchanania lanzan (= B. latifolia) of Anacardiaceae family, the seeds of which are used as food, esp. in making sweets, and also in getting tannin; forest mango.
any of the heavenly bodies, except the moon, appearing as fixed luminous points in the sky at night; a star.
a small square, like that of a chessboard, on a fabric as a pattern.
ಚಾರ್ಖಾನೆ ಸೀರೆ cārkhāne sīre a kind of chequered sari (the traditional dress of Indian women).
the act of smearing, anointing a perfume on the body.
a kind of perfumed powder used in festive occasions for applying on the body.
money paid or to be paid for transportation in a train, taxi, plane, etc.; fare.

charge - a) responsibility or duty (as of an officer, minister, etc.); b) care, custody or supervision (of something); c) the amount charged by a professional (as a doctor, consultant, etc.) for the service rendered; d) the cost or price of an article.
having or having covered with, skin.
a multitude of leathers or hides.
a pile of shields (defence-armours).
= ಚಾಲುವರಿ.
a follower of 'ಚಾರ್ವಾಕದರ್ಶನ' (see below) the materialistic philosophy.
the belief that there is no god or denial that god or gods exist; atheism.

one of the systems of Indian philosophy which denied the validity of any source of knowledge other than immediate sense-perception, denied the existence of god, soul, religious and moral values, believed to be founded by the sage ಚಾರ್ವಾಕ; the atheistic or materialistic philosophy.
= ಚಾರ್ವಾಕದರ್ಶನ.
= ಚಾರ್ವಾಕದರ್ಶನ.
the tree Shorea talura (= S,. robusta) of Dipterocarpaceae family; (?).
a man who organises, schedules manages or controls works; an organiser; a manager.
a man who drives an automobile, cart, etc.; a coachman or chauffeur; a driver.
a female organiser or manager.
a woman who drives an automobile, cart, etc.; a driver.
now going on; now in progress; current.
being used; being in vogue; prevalent.
the quality or fact of being in progress; currency.
common acceptance; general use; prevalence.

an account of credits, debits, receipts, and expenditures between two individuals or companies, usu. providing for settlement at the end of specified accounting periods or an account of an individual, company with a bank from which money can be drawn without any notice; a current account.
a deposit of some amount with a banker by an individual or company, which can be drawn without any notice.
= ಚಾಲತಿಠೇವಣಿ.
the records required for day-to-day transactions.

a part of the investment required in a business or industrial enterprises, for operational purposes, as payment of salary, purchase of materials, processing cost, inventory holding cost, etc. (as diff. from the portion required for capital investment); working capital.
assets, used in day-to-day business, that are readily convertible into cash, without loss in value; current assets or liquid assets.
the year in progress; the current year.
the act of moving, driving, shaking, wagging, etc, something.
the act of putting into action or motion or causing to take action; actuation; urge.
the act of putting or passing something through a sieve to separate fine particles of loose matter from coarser ones; a sieving.
the act of making loose or looser; a loosening.
a utensil having many small meshed or perforated openings, used to strain solids from liquids, to separate fine particles of loose matter from coarser ones, etc.; a sifter or strainer; a sieve.
an act of urging; impelling action, influence or force; an impulse; an urge.
the act or an instance of using of one's power, authority, etc.
= ಚಾಲುವರಿ.
the quality of being shrewd, quick, brisk; acumen; smartness.
a shrewd, intelligent man.
any of several movements on the floor ( as with the feet) or in air (as of hands) in dancing.
moved; made to move; driven.
shaken; agitated; stirred.
to cause to move, go ahead or away.
to cause to move to and fro (frequently) to shake (something).
to become stretched out or extended; to extend (oneself) over a greater or a considerable area.
to cause to increase; to make more.
to move (oneself) forward; to go against.
to avoid (something) from happening; to fend off.
to waste; to squander.
to cheat; to deceive.
the act of moving, going, walking, etc.
the act of starting, beginning or commencing.
the way a person habitually behaves or acts; manners.
that which has become a regular habit, manner, by observing, performing repeatedly or regularly.
common acceptance; general use; prevalence.
the manner or mode particular to a particular system of music.
the fact or state of being obsessed with an idea, desire, emotion, etc.; an obsession.
a way of doing, being done or happening; mode of action, occurrence, etc.; a manner.
a particular manner in which one moves to hold his opponent in wrestling.
a lease of agricultural land, with certain amount of money or agricultural produce agreed to be given by the lessee to the lessor (land owner) as annual rent.
the rent paid or to be paid so (annually).
to ask someone earnestly; to entreat humbly; to implore.
= ಚಾಲುವರಿ.

= ಚಾಲುವರಿ.
a symbol for the number nine.
an instrument for striking or flogging, consisting generally of a stiff or flexible rod with a lash attached to one end; a whip.
a thin, twisted cord, used by children to spin a top, a cone-shaped toy, on its pointed end.
a man who commits or is habitually inclined to, adultery.
a morally bad or wicked man.
a hall or building where governmental deliberations are officially held; a court.
the building, platform or an open space where the members of village administration body meet for deliberation.
a raised platform in front of a house, attached to the front wall, on either side of the main entrance, used as a sit-out.
a place of protection; a shelter.
the office of local police force.
a member of a local government of a village.
the power, authority or jurisdiction of a body or government.
= ಚಾವಡಿ.
a place where tents, huts, barracks or other more or less temporary structures have been put up for soldiers; a camp.
the outside top covering of a building; the roof, roof-top, terrace.
a house or home.
the quality or fact of being unsteady, wavering; unsteadiness.
inability to take a firm decision, forming opinion.
the quality of being erratic in habits, purpose or behaviour.
an irrepressible desire; such a tendency.
to cause to become unsteady; to cause to shake, quiver.
to cause to become inconsistent, wavering, indecisive.
to speak slightingly, disdainfully.
to utter a sound or sounds.
= ಚಾವಲ.
= ಚಾವಲಿಸು.
a small metal instrument specially cut to fit into a lock and move its bolt or bolts to open or lock; a key.
one of the seven mother-goddesses.
Durge, in her formidable form, assumed to kill the demon Caṇḍa.
= ಚಾವಡಿ.

any of several birds of the family Coraciidae that tumble or roll over in flight as Coracias indica, Boracus Indica the flight of which is consulted as an omen or Coracias benghalensis, etc.; the Indian roller.

(dance.) a movement expressing fear, in which the right foot is put forward one span apart from the left, and drawn back quickly so that the two feet might be two spans apart, then stand in normal position by jumping.
the utterance in the presence of another person, of a false statement or statements, damaging to a third person's character or reputation; slandering.
a malicious, false, and defamatory statement made so; a slander.
a person who makes such statements; a slanderer.
an alphabetical list of names, subjects, etc. together with the page numbers where they appear in the text, usu. placed at the end of a book; an index.
an attendant who carries umbrella for his master.
the grass Cymbopogan martinii (=Andropogan martini) of Poaceae family; rose grass; Geranium grass.
a group of similar, small houses or a line of such houses.
a man who organises, schedules manages or controls works; an organiser; a manager.
a man who drives an automobile, cart, etc.; a driver; a coachman or chauffeur.
skilful in underhand or evil schemes; cunning; deceitful; sly.
a man who is subtly deceitful, sly, cunning, etc.; a crafty man.

= ಚಾಲನಿ.
an Asiatic myna bird (Gracula religiosa) with glossy black plumage, white breast, and with the ability to mimic human speech; hill myna.
(astrol.) Rāhu, one of the nine planets that are believed to rule the destiny of human beings.
the act of moving, going, walking, etc.
the act of starting, beginning or commencing.
the way a person habitually behaves or acts; manners.
that which has become a regular habit, manner, by observing, performing repeatedly and regularly.
common acceptance; general use; prevalence.
the manner or mode unique or special to a particular system of music.
the fact or state of being obsessed with an idea, desire, emotion, etc.; an obsession.
a way of doing, being done or happening; mode of action, occurrence, etc.; a manner.
a particular manner in which one moves to hold his opponent in wrestling.
any bad habit, manner; a bad conduct.
a kind of perfume.
to put or pass through a sieve to separate fine particles from the coarser ones or undissolved material from a liquid; to sieve; to sift.
to drive (a person, army, etc.) away by over powering, defeating (as in a combat).
to treat with disrespect or say something slighting another.
to worry or trouble; to harass.
(mus.) to sing a rāga (musical mode) elaborately, as a prelude to a composition that follows it.
to shrink from in disgust; to detest; to abhor.
the plant Abies webbiana of Pinaceae family; silver fur.
the cardinal number forty; 40.
an eye defect, that a person gets usu. at the age of forty, that makes the person capable of seeing far off objects but not clearly the near ones.
a pair of glass set in a frame, used to aid the defective sight of a person.
= ಚಾಳ.
any of numerous birds of prey of the family Accipitridae, having a short, hooked beak, broad wings, and curved talons, often seen circling or swooping at low altitude; a hawk.
quickness; swiftness.
the act, fact or an instance of moving, walking, etc.; movement.
the act or an instance of moving by leaping or springing on both feet at once, (as a frog); hopping.
such a movement in wrestling, to catch the opponent.
the manner in which musical notes are structured and sung to expound the sentiment of a rāga (musical mode).
a sequence of movements in dancing, usually repeated in a set pattern.

= ಚಾಳಕ3.
deceit, trickery, sharp practice or breach of confidence, perpetrated for profit or to gain some unfair or dishonest advantage; fraud.
(astrol.) Rāhu, one of the nine planets that are believed to rule the destiny of human beings.
(myth.) the supposed ring of light that is encircling Rāhu, an imaginary planet.
a kind of ornament.
an ox with a number of spots of different colour on its body.
the tree Tamarindus indica of Caesalpinaceae family with yellow flowers and brown pods with an acid pulp; tamarind tree.
its fruit.
a kind of tree.
a plant akin to henna.
an ornament, in the form of the tamarind leaves, worn by women round the necks.

the woody tropical vine, Abrus precatorius, of Papilionaceae family, having extremely poisonous scarlet and black seeds that are used for beads and a root used as a substitute for liquorice; crab's eye; Indian liquorice.
a domestic cow with a number of spots of different colour on its body.
a kind of plant .
the tree Cerbera manghas (= C. odollum) of Apocynaceae family.
a thinker - a) a man who thinks, as in a specified way or manner; b) a man who has a well-developed faculty for thinking, as a philosopher, theorist or scholar.
(fem.) a thinker - a) a woman who thinks, as in a specified way or manner; b) a woman who has a well-developed faculty for thinking, as a philosopher, theorist or scholar.
thoughtful - a) full of thought; meditative; thinking; b) showing or characterised by thought; serious.
= ಚಿಂತಕ.
the quality of a person that thinks, cogitates or meditates on a subject deeply and seriously.
= ಚಿಂತನಪರ1.
= ಚಿಂತಕ.
= ಚಿಂತನಪರತೆ.
a subject fit to be pondered, cogitated.
that part of the knowledge of a subject, which is to be pondered, meditated on.
that is to be thought deeply about , pondered, cogitated.
fit to be pondered, cogitated.
that which is fit to be thought about, pondered or cogitated.
the act of thinking seriously and deeply about; a pondering, meditation.
meditation - a) act of meditating; deep, continued thought; b) solemn reflection on sacred matters as a devotional act.
a thought or thoughts - a) a result of thinking; an idea, concept, opinion, etc.; b) the ideas, principles, opinions, etc. of a person or prevalent at a given time or place or among a given people.
to feel distressed in the mind; to be or become anxious, troubled or uneasy.
a necklace, in the form of the tamarind leaves, worn by women.
a metal waist belt, worn by women as an ornament.
having or characterised or distressed by worry; concerned; anxious; mentally disturbed.
a worried, anxious, mentally disturbed man.
the fact or state of being mentally disturbed; the worried condition or feeling; uneasiness or anxiety; worry.
a woman who has given way to anxiety or unease or whose mind is dwelt on difficulty or troubles; a worried or distressed woman.
= ಚಿಂತಾಕುಲತೆ.
distressed, troubled by worry or worries.
a man distressed, troubled by worry or worries.
a woman distressed, troubled by worry or worries.

the quality of a person who thinks, cogitates or meditates on a subject deeply and seriously.
the burden caused by a worry or worries.
absorbed deeply or engrossed in a worry or worries.
a man who is absorbed deeply or engrossed in a worry or worries.
the fact or condition of being deeply absorbed or engrossed in worry or worries.
a woman who is absorbed deeply or engrossed in a worry or worries.
a celestial gem that is believed to grant all wishes.
(fig.) an excellent, extremely virtuous or meritorious person.
(fig.) a man who concedes all requests of another or others.
(mus.) a rāga (musical mode), in Karnāṭaka system, derived from the main modeṢaṇmukhapriya.
a kind of liquor.
he who bothers much always for his devotees; the God.
the act of cogitating about or worrying within.
the tendency of a person given to deep thinking, meditating.
= ಚಿಂತಾಮಣಿ.
an instrument of any type for determining weight, as a spring balance, a balance with two pans hanging on either side of a beam, etc.
occupied with or given to thought; contemplating; meditating; reflecting.
a man occupied with or engrossed in a thought.
a woman occupied with or engrossed in a thought.
a necklace, in the form of the tamarind leaves, worn by women.
thought (of); considered; mediated (upon).
remembered; recollected; recalled to mind.
a result of thinking; idea, concept, opinion, etc.; thought.
that which is desired, craved or longed for.
(mus.) a particular fault in pronouncing musical notes.
a man worrying about; an anxious man.
a woman worrying about; an anxious woman.

to think - a) to form or have in the mind; conceive; b) to hold in one's opinion; to judge; to consider; c) to determine, resolve, work out, etc. by reasoning; d) to have the mind turned steadily toward; to have constantly in mind; e) to have regard for; to consider the welfare of.
to torment oneself with or suffer from disturbing thoughts; to feel worry, annoyance, discontent or the like; to worry.
a disturbed state of mind; anxiety; uneasiness; worry.
interest in or regard for a person or thing; concern.
meditation - a) continued or extended thought; reflection; contemplation; b) devout religious contemplation or spiritual introspection.
(rhet.) a dealing with a subject continuously, as one of minor sentiments.
a psychological disorder caused by a sexual longing that is unfulfilled.
ಚಿಂತೆಯೇ ಮುಪ್ಪು cinteyē muppu (prov.) worries age a person early as contrary to 'happy heart makes a blooming visage'.
to become anxious from fear, uncertainty, loss etc.
to think, worry about; to become sad.
capable of being grasped, imagined or conceived; understandable; conceivable.
that is fit to be understood, conceived.
one of the minor, religious scriptures of Hindus.
any man or boy lacking normal function of the testes, as through castration or disease; an eunuch.
a kind of ear ornament.
a piece of cloth that is torn or worn; rag.
an oblong cloth to tie around the head.
a band of flexible material, as leather or cord, for encircling the waist; a belt.

ಚಿಂದಿ ಉಡಾಯಿಸು cindi uḍāyisu to render (a wealthy or good state) to nothing; to spoil completely; 2. to spend lavishly (all the money one has); ಚಿಂದಿಯಾಗು cindiyāgu to be torn into pieces; to be worn out (completely); 2. (fig.) (a family organization, etc.) to be destroyed, spoiled pitiably.
a kind of dance by a group of people with fancy costumes.
a kind of musical composition.

the large, somewhat arboreal anthropoid ape, Pan troglodytes, with black hair and large, outstanding ears, hands adapted for knuckle-walking, and is smaller than a gorilla and is noted for its intelligence; chimpanzee.
a hard, bivalve outer covering of mollusc, insect, egg, etc.; a shell.
the hard shell of a coconut covering the kernel; coconut-shell.
the top bony portion of the skull.
a small chest or box with a lid, as for jewels; a casket.
a thin piece of wood, bone, etc., made by splitting or breaking; a sliver; a splinter.
a thin and sharp piece of wood; a splint.
a kind of musical instrument.
the outer covering of anything.
a single cluster of banana fruits.
a shell or vessel having a hollow with a pointed mouth, used to feed milk to babies.
a man who makes, repairs or alters clothes; a tailor.
a sound made to express one's disgust, regret, etc.
to make a sound to express one's disgust, regret, dissent, etc (as in scolding).
to fix (with or as with an adhesive).
a kind of fish.
not easily dented, crushed; hard.
of or constituting the intrinsic, fundamental nature of something; basic; essential.
thick; stout.
of, like, consisting of, containing, covered with oil or the like.
of good quality; better.

the tapering point at the top of a mountain; a peak; the top portion of a tree.
a mount (as the one having a peak or peaks).

probing, tending to examine to find the cause based on the symptoms; diagnostic.
one who diagnoses and treats (a sick person); a doctor; a physician.

of or constituting a diagnosis.
treated with medical or surgical care.
medical or surgical care required for of extended to a sick, injured person.

the desire of doing (something).
something wished for or intended (to do, achieve), etc.
intentionally mischievous or harmful; malicious.
without thought or consideration for others; thoughtless; heedless; inconsiderate; rash.
moving; tremulous; fickle; unsteady.

its root or the powder made by roasting and grinding this root for mixing with coffee powder.
small - a) little in size, esp. when compared with others of the same kind; not large or big; limited in size; b) of slight intensity; of limited degree or scope.
young (said of children or offsprings of animals).
mean - a) small-minded or ignoble; b) inferior in grade, quality or character; c) low in status, rank or dignity; d) of little importance or consequence.
the state of being very young or immature.
a network of rope that can be suspended from the roof-beam of a house, used to keep vessels from the easy reach of children or cats, rats, etc.
a carry-bag made of net work of threads or strings.
a pouch made of network of threads for tying the mouths of cattle.
flat-nosed.
the plant Costus speciosus of Zingiberaceae family, the oil extracted from which is used in perfumery; sweet costus.
the state or time of being a boy or girl; boyhood or girlhood.
during boyhood or girlhood.

a kind of herb.

a kind of plant .

its seed.
the plant Enicostemma verticillatum (=E. littorale) of Gentianaceae family.
any of varois small bloodsucking insects, that live as parasites on mammals and birds; a flea.
= ಚಿಕ್ಕಟ.
a kind of plant .
= ಚಿಕ್ಕಟ.
soothing; smooth.
unctuous; greasy.
the act of soothing (as a medicine, ointment); a demulcent.
that which smoothened, softened.
a food that is made very soft by cooking more or over-cooking.
the palm tree Areca catechu of Arecaceae family.
